title: Microsoft Security Operations Analyst (SC-200)
subtitle: Investigate and Respond to Threats with Microsoft Security Solutions
description: Master threat detection, investigation, and response using Microsoft Sentinel, Defender XDR, and Defender for Cloud
overview: This intensive course prepares you to work as a Security Operations Center (SOC) analyst using Microsoft's comprehensive security platform. You'll learn to investigate and respond to threats using Microsoft Sentinel SIEM/SOAR, Microsoft Defender XDR, and Microsoft Defender for Cloud. Master the skills to protect your organization against modern cyber threats.

personalStory.story: Working in security operations is both challenging and rewarding. I've helped organizations build their SOC capabilities from the ground up using Microsoft's security stack. The integration between Sentinel and Defender XDR creates a powerful platform for detecting and responding to threats. This course teaches you the real-world skills that SOC analysts use every day to protect their organizations.
